title: Samples, "Kon-Tiki", introduced 1954
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: Kon-Tiki designed by Inge Toft  A Knoll Textile Screen Print
dimensions:
H x W: 62.9 x 61 cm (24 3/4 x 24 in.)
Repeat H: 21 cm (8 1/4 in.)
description: Grid-based linear design; a is white lines on a blue ground, and b is black lines on a white ground. Each has several smaller samples of alternate colorways attached to the top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Samples, "Kon-Tiki", introduced 1954.
introduced 1954. Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave. Gift of Mae Lamar Festa. 1991-157-2-a,b.
